title: Salesforce | SMTS | Hyderabad
content:
Education: BTech CSE
Years of Experience: 5.3
Prior Experience: Startups (40 LPA)
Date of the Offer: Nov 2023
Company: Salesforce
Title/Level: SMTS
Location: Hyderabad
Salary: 49 lacs
Relocation: 1.5 lacs
Signing Bonus: 0
Stock bonus: $85K stock grant vested over 4 years
Bonus: Performance-based bonus up to 15% of salary every year
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~75.5 LPA for 1st year, ~74 LPA 2nd year onwards
Benefits: Standard benefits
Other details: Did not negotiate

Am I getting low-balled here? Please advice.
salaryTotal: : ~75.5 Lpa For 1st Year, ~74 Lpa 2nd Year Onwards

title: Servicenow | IC2 | Hydrabad
content:
Education: Tier 3/4 College
Years of Experience: 2+ yrs
Prior Experience: Service based MNC
Prior Compensation: 4LPA
Company: ServiceNow
Title/Level: Software Engineer(IC2)
Location: Hyderabad
Base Salary: Rs.21,00,000(Excluding Employer PF)
relocation: 20,000
Joining Bonus: NA
Stock Bonus: $29000(4year vesting schedule)
Performance Bonus: 10% of base
1st Year Salary: 21+ 6 = ~28LPA
Other Benefits: Standard Servicenow benefits.

I was very happy and accept the offer eagerly

title: SAP | Developer Associate-II | Pune
content:
Education: MTech in Computer Science from IITK
Years of Experience: 5 months
Prior Experience: Interned at Amazon 
Date of the Offer: Fall 2022
Company: SAP Labs
Title/Level: Developer Associate
Location: Pune, India
Salary: Rs 16,00,000
Joining Bonus: Rs. 6,00,000 over 3 years
Stock bonus: Rs 4,50,000 over 3 years
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~Rs. 21,00,000
Benefits: Rs. 7,60,800 (includes free meals on campus, free transport for office commute, relocation etc.)
